item.title: Academic
item.description: The Best Way to Create the Website You Want from Markdown (or RStudio/Jupyter) Build Anything with Widgets Star

item.title: News
item.description: 31/07/2019 We are excited to release SIF - a code analysis and instrumentation framework for Solidity smart contracts. 30/05/2019 My PhD research proposal On the Correctness of GPU programs is accepted by ISSTA 2019 Doctoral Symposium. 01/24/2019 Our paper CLTestCheck: Measuring Test Effectiveness for GPU Kernels is accepted by FASE 2019. 01/09/2017 Started my PhD at University of Edinburgh with Dr. Ajitha Rajan fully funded by Huawei Scholarship. 17/11/2016 Our Team EPCC selected to participate in the final round of the ISC Student Cluster Competition.

item.title: Awards

item.title: Extra-Curricular & Volunteer Experience
item.description: [13 Apr 2017-15 Apr] 2017 Volunteer and demonstrator at drop-in event ‘What can supercomputers do’ at Edinburgh International Science Festival [Sep 2013 - Sep 2014] Key volunteer of the 18th Sports Meeting of Jiangsu Province [Dec 2014 - Dec 2015] President of the Student Union of Department of Information & Electrical Engineering, Xuzhou University of Technology
